tweet.text: 1942: #FDR praises devotion of #Gandhi to “democracy and righteousness” and promises “a supreme effort to defeat those who would deny forever all hope of freedom throughout the world.” https://t.co/i62VP4u8yz #FRUS @USAmbIndia @IndianEmbassyUS https://t.co/387Zjt0YuB
